NAME.Nominative: Saint Fulvianus, Prince of Ethiopia, in Holy Baptism Matthew (1<sup>st</sup> C)

SAINT.LIFE: He handed over the Holy Apostle Matthew to fire, but seeing the miracles leading to the death of the Holy Apostle, believed in Christ and zealously preached the Christian faith. Later for his saintly life he became worthy of the rank of bishop. He died in peace.
